heading.title: Create a passkey on this device

details.passkeyBenefit1Title: No need to remember a password
details.passkeyBenefit1Description: With passkeys, you can use things like your fingerprint or face to login.
details.passkeyBenefit2Title: Works on all of your devices
details.passkeyBenefit2Description: Passkeys will automatically be available across your synced devices.
